label: 梨壺
本: The Clear Mirror:  A Chronicle of Japanese Court During the Kamakura Period, (1185-1333) . Stanford University Press . 1998
説明文: Another name for the Shōhōsha, a building in the residential compound of the greater imperial palace; so called from the trees in its courtyard. Site of the poetry office (wakadokoro) established to compile Gosenshū.
